item.title: Rails 2.3 Application Template template.rb
item.author: mark@markrichman.com (Mark Richman)
item.description:
Here’s my current Rails 2.3 application template which uses the following features:

  • asset_packager
  • exception_notifier
  • paperclip
  • restful-authentication (generates user and session)
  • role-requirement (generates roles for user)
  • rspec
  • cucumber
  • active_merchant
  • sqlite3-ruby
  • will_paginate
  • haml
  • nifty_layout
  • Capistrano capify
  • database session store

item.title: Deploying Rails Apps with Capistrano, Git, and Passenger
item.author: mark@markrichman.com (Mark Richman)
item.description: I host my sites on an Ubuntu VPS. I use a combination of Rails, Apache2, Phusion Passenger, Git, and MySQL. I have a pretty useful Capistrano deploy.rb if you have a similar configuration. I’d love some feedback, as I promised to assist Jamis Buck in his Capistrano documentation efforts.
